problem.p: Using the same data and setup from the previous on-paper activity, check your work by constructing a Free Body Diagram using the vector drawing tool below. If you have troulbe with this activity, you can download a similar application created by PhET (https://phet.colorado.edu/en/simulation/vector-addition).

The vector drawing tool below is easy to use. You can add vectors by simply clicking or touching the screen. You can then manipulate magnitude and direction by clicking/dragging the tip of each vector.

p.b: You can use the vector properties information to line up your vectors. Note, you only need to get close to the exact values given for each vector.
